name: Get Out Now! - 3D Escape From The Maze Game
name_original: Get Out Now! - 3D Escape From The Maze Game
description:
Are you an expert at mazes?

You find yourself on the tenth floor of a building which has caught fire. The only way to escape is to navigate through a maze to get to the next lowest floor. You had better hurry, the fire is growing and its beginning to get warm. Can you escape?

Get Out Now is a 3D maze game where you navigate your selected character through a randomly generated maze. Time is running out, and if you don't find the exit, the building becomes an inferno. Choose from four difficulty levels. Select from fourteen different characters. Pick standard one finger joystick or buttons for control. Good Luck!

Whether you are a complete newbie with maze games; or a seasoned old-crusty pro who escaped from Deathmaze 5000 on the TRS-80, Get Out Now has something for you.

No in-app purchases. Buy once and play forever.
Please do us a solid, review Get Out Now in the App Store.
Thanks!
